ingredients.item: 75g cavolo nero, stems and leaves separated
400g can essential Chick Peas, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large sauté pan or casserole dish over a medium heat. Add the frozen soffritto, chopped cavolo nero stems and rosemary, season and fry for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until soft and just turning golden.

Stir in the chick peas and stock then mash roughly with a potato masher (leave about ½ of the chick peas whole). Simmer for 2 minutes, then fold in the cavolo nero leaves and simmer for 2 minutes more until wilted. Meanwhile poach the eggs in a separate pan of barely simmering water for 3-4 minutes, or until the white has set.
Discard the rosemary sprigs from the chick peas, check the seasoning and add a squeeze of lemon juice. Divide between 2 shallow bowls and top each with a poached egg.
